message.content:
We can “derive” the revenue item (that is, the “main business revenue”) by summing up the sales‐side entries – that is, the “Sale” rows – using the “after_tax_amount” field. (In an income statement the sales revenue is often “net sales” which here we take to be the “after_tax_amount”.)

Step‑by‑step, we do the following:

1. Look through the transactions and pick out every row whose type is “Sale”. (Other types such as purchase, expense, interest, depreciation, transfers, etc. are not “sales”.)

2. For each “Sale” type row, use its “after_tax_amount” value. For our data the “Sale” rows are (with their “after_tax_amount” values):

  • Sale20240105004: 1389880.74  
  • Sale20240107006: 2051607.53  
  • Sale20240111008: 712121.66  
  • Sale20240114011: 1266052.32  
  • Sale20240117015: 1090178.16  
  • Sale20240118016: 2048643.48  
  • Sale20240119018: 635367.73  
  • Sale20240121020: 631214.04  
  • Sale20240125022: 641088.87  
  • Sale20240128026: 671829.49  
  • Sale20240130027: 1987240.17  
  • Sale20240131029: 1346585.41  
  • Sale20240201031: 1899624.38  
  • Sale20240203034: 1926981.99  
  • Sale20240204037: 1004112.16

3. Now, summing these values one by one:
  • Sum rows [1–5]:
   1389880.74 + 2051607.53 = 3441488.27  
   3441488.27 + 712121.66 = 4153609.93  
   4153609.93 + 1266052.32 = 5419662.25  
   5419662.25 + 1090178.16 = 6509840.41

  • Next, add the next group:
   6509840.41 + 2048643.48 = 8558483.89  
   8558483.89 + 635367.73 = 9193851.62  
   9193851.62 + 631214.04 = 9825065.66  
   9825065.66 + 641088.87 = 10466154.53  
   10466154.53 + 671829.49 = 11137984.02

  • Finally, add the remaining sales:
   11137984.02 + 1987240.17 = 13125224.19  
   13125224.19 + 1346585.41 = 14471809.60  
   14471809.60 + 1899624.38 = 16371433.98  
   16371433.98 + 1926981.99 = 18298415.97  
   18298415.97 + 1004112.16 = 19302528.13

4. Thus the final “main business revenue” (the sum of the after‑tax amounts for all “Sale” transactions) is 19,302,528.13.

We now put this in the required JSON format:

{
  "solution": {
    "Main Business Revenue": "19302528.13"
  }
}
